targets.expr: sum(collectd_ng_connections_count{exported_instance="$epc_ip"} OR on() vector(0) + collectd_s1_connections_count{exported_instance="$epc_ip"} OR on() vector(0))

list.name: epc_ip
list.query: query_result(sum by (exported_instance)(collectd_s1_connections_count or collectd_ng_connections_count or collectd_resources_vcpu {resources="mme"}))
